job.details:
• Development and maintenance of web content for BMO, BMO Capital Markets, BMO adviceDirect, BMO InvestorLine, BMO Investor Solutions, BMO ETFs, BMO Guardian Funds, and other BMO lines of business (XHTML / HTML5 / JS / jQuery / CSS2 / AJAX / XML / ASP Classic VB / ASP.NET / MSSQL)

  • Full lifecycle development experience with involvement in all steps including: project scope & plan, design, development, testing, implementation, and maintenance

  • Ensuring standards and best practices are met for all projects including high web performance and efficiency, cross-browser compatibility, SEO, and web accessibility
  • Mobile web development using HTML5 / AJAX
  • Actively contribute to discussions and brainstorming sessions
  • Work with managers to scope out and determine requirements for new projects
  • Held learning sessions on topics such as web accessibility and front-end best practices to help facilitate knowledge sharing
  • Subject Matter Expert (SME) for a majority of tools and CMSes the development team uses
  • Able to manage and mentor co-op and developer resources
  • Interviewed prospective front-end developers
  • 2012 & 2011 Quarterly Top Performance award
  • 2012 Performance Rating: Outstanding (highest rating)
  • 2011 Performance Rating: Distinguished
